snippet.title: Dan The Man - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Click to Subscribe: http://bit.ly/HalfbrickYTSubscribe

Welcome to Dan the Man!
From the studio that brought you Fruit Ninja and Jetpack Joyride, comes a story of love, betrayal and the quest for power. The battlefield awaits. Answer the call of duty to your people and your way of life. Fight the forces of evil and save the day in the smoothest retrogaming experience on mobile. 

Shoot, fight and platform your way through 12 challenging Story levels and even more challenging boss fights.

Unlock Battle and endless Survival Modes to give your gaming prowess a thorough workout. 

With additional and customisable characters, weekly rewards and Easter eggs galore, Dan The Man is your new retro gaming obsession. 


Play Dan the Man now - http://bit.ly/2dqKtFn

http://danthemangame.com/
https://www.facebook.com/danthemangame

Follow us on Social Media:

Twitter: @Halfbrick

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/halfbrick/
